name: AIVideo.com
headline: The all in one tool for AI powered video production
description: We built an AI agent to create professional quality videos for 1% of the time and cost of traditional video production. Our AI agent orchestrates the creation of complete videos (script, visuals, VoiceOver, effects, etc.) by utilizing dozens of task-specific AI models in a single workflow.

founders.name: Justin Harvey, Founder
founders.description: Building superhuman video production as a service - AIVideo.com

founders.name: Eduardo Faraday, Founder
founders.description:
Building Infobot - AI Personal Journalist

Former founder at Workep. Scaled to +300k users. Prev. Product lead at Oasis, first AI Video Avatars. @BerkeleySkydeck | StanfordLB

founders.name: Orestis Lykouropoulos, Founder
founders.description:
Greek born, US based software engineer & composer.
Passionate about language applications of ML (ex AWS AI, ex Alexa) and orchestral music.

generated_description:
### AIVideo.com: Transforming Video Production with AI

**Overview**  
AIVideo.com is a cutting-edge company specializing in AI-powered video production, making it possible for users to create professional-quality videos in a fraction of the time and cost compared to traditional methods. Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, this Oakland-based startup is poised to redefine the media landscape.

**Mission**  
The mission at AIVideo.com is straightforward: to be the all-in-one tool for AI-powered video production. They aim to simplify and streamline the video creation process, allowing anyone to produce high-quality content quickly and efficiently.

**Foundation and Team**  
The company was established in 2023, starting with the vision of building an AI agent capable of creating complete videos—this includes everything from the script and visuals to voiceovers and effects—utilizing task-specific AI models in a seamless workflow. The team is currently composed of 7 employees, operating under the guidance of Harj Taggar as their Group Partner.

**Technology and Features**  
AIVideo.com leverages a suite of state-of-the-art AI technologies, streamlining the video-making process. Users can transform a simple description into a polished video within minutes. Key features include:

- **Automated Script Writing:** Quickly generate scripts based on user prompts.
- **Visual and Audio Synthesis:** Create visuals and voiceovers with advanced AI models.
- **Dynamic Effects:** Add impressive effects that enhance storytelling.
- **Multi-language Support:** Catering to a global audience by supporting various languages.
- **AI Sound Effects and Voiceovers:** Offering a rich auditory experience to complement the visuals.

**Community and Impact**  
AIVideo.com has quickly garnered attention, evidenced by testimonials from creators who note the speed and quality of the videos. Users claim they can run multiple channels in different niches without breaking a sweat, thanks to the platform's efficiency and flexibility.

**Backers and Partnerships**  
Backed by top-tier investors, including Balaji Srinivasan, former Coinbase CTO, and Paul Graham, YC founder, AIVideo.com is well-positioned for growth. They’ve partnered with leaders in AI technology, including OpenAI and Eleven Labs, to enhance their offerings.

**Final Thoughts**  
AIVideo.com is tapping into the burgeoning field of generative AI with a compelling value proposition: anyone can create stunning videos effortlessly. With an eye toward the future of video production and a commitment to pushing technological boundaries, AIVideo.com is a company worth watching. For more information, check out their official site at [AIVideo.com](https://aivideo.com).
